--- 
title: "Outbreak Dynamics Surveillance Infrastructure"
author: "Thibaut Jombart"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
site: bookdown::bookdown_site
documentclass: book
bibliography: [book.bib, packages.bib]
biblio-style: apalike
link-citations: yes
description: "This short handbook provides documentation for the Automated Outbreak Dynamics Surveillance Infrastructure developed by the WHO COVID-19 analytics team"
output:
  bookdown::gitbook:
    lib_dir: assets
    split_by: section
    config:
      toolbar:
        position: static
  bookdown::pdf_book:
    keep_tex: yes
  bookdown::html_book:
    css: toc.css
---


```{r include=FALSE}
# automatically create a bib database for R packages
knitr::write_bib(c(
  .packages(), 'bookdown', 'knitr', 'rmarkdown'
), 'packages.bib')

# knitr options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  eval = TRUE,
  include = TRUE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE
)

# Function to insert a markdown file from its path
insert_md <- function(x) {
	cat(readLines(x))
}

```
